tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Customer_Feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Regulatory_Compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    feedback_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    email_address VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Complaints (
    complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    complaint_text TEXT,
    complaint_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryBodies (
    body_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    body_name VARCHAR(50),
    body_type VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceIssues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    body_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    issue_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES Complaints(complaint_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (body_id) REFERENCES RegulatoryBodies(body_id)
)
